      • setupHTMLGeneratorTest

        public void setupHTMLGeneratorTest()
        Initialises a Player and defines a path on the map, before every unit test.
        Throws:
        NullPositionException - is thrown whenever the start_position is not set (unexpected).
        NullTeamException - is thrown when Team team is null, i.e. when it has not been set.

      • singletonTest

        public void singletonTest()
        Tests whether the same instance is returned when attempting to create a new instance (i.e. testing the singleton pattern).

      • visited_tilesTest

        public void visited_tilesTest()
        Testing whether the generated HTML map is coloured correctly, based on the TileType definition for each visited tile, except the starting tile and the current tile.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - whenever the Player or Map instances passed are null (not expected).
        NullTeamException - is thrown when Team team is null, i.e. when it has not been set (not expected).

      • unvisited_tilesTest

        public void unvisited_tilesTest()

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - whenever the Player or Map instances passed are null (not expected).
        NullTeamException - is thrown when Team team is null, i.e. when it has not been set (not expected).
